summary: Use this api to get first mile waybill file
description: Use this api to get first mile waybill file.

query.name: region
query.description: Use this field to specify the region you want to ship parcel. Available value: CN, KR

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: shipment_method
schema.description: The shipment method for bound orders.Available values: pickup, dropoff, self_deliver.
